articles.title: Hero MotoCorp Records Highest Monthly Sales In Oct 2020; 8 Lakh+ Units Sold - GaadiWaadi.com
articles.description: Hero registered cumulative domestic sales of 8,06,848 units in October 2020 as against 5,99,248 units during the same period last year
articles.content: Hero MotoCorp registered a total of 8,06,848 units in the month of October 2020, highest ever sales for the brand in a single month in its history. Resultantly, the largest two-wheeler manufacturer i… [+2012 chars]

articles.title: Equitas Small Finance Bank lists at 6% discount over issue price - Mint
articles.description: The initial public offering (IPO), to raise  ₹518 crore, was subscribed 1.95 times during the 20-22 October share sale
articles.content: Shares of Equitas Small Finance Bank made a tepid stock markets debut on Monday. The stock listed at 31.10, a discount of 5.7% over its issue price of 33 a piece. The initial public offering (IPO), t… [+2191 chars]
